Description.Text: Located in Victoria and Westminster, Georgian House Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore London. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, babysitting are just some of the facilities on offer. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, wake-up service, desk. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Georgian House Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore London or to simply relax and rejuvenate.
